Ardi Bakrie, Atlet Indonesia Siap Kibarkan Merah Putih di Arena Kejuaraan Dunia MMA Amatir
06 Nov 2019, 15:55 by Adi Wiyono


Ardi Bakrie, Atlet Indonesia Siap Kibarkan Merah Putih di Arena Kejuaraan Dunia MMA Amatir

KBRN, Jakarta : Komite Olahraga Beladiri Indonesia, KOBI menerjunkan 5 atlet MMA terbaik pada Kejuaraan Dunia Mix Martials Arts MMA Amatir 2019 yang berlangsung di Khalifa Sports City, Isa Town, Manama Bahrain 11-16 Novembet 2019. 
Ketua umum Komite Olahraga Beladiri Indonesia, KOBI Ardiansyah Bakrie kepada Media di Jakarta Rabu  (6/11/2019) melihat ini menjadi sejarah baru , bisa mengirim Timnas MMA untuk berjuang di arena Kejuaraan Dunia MMA 2019 setelah Indonesia dibawah KOBI masuk dalam keanggotaan IMMAF (Federasi Mix Martial Arts International). 
Seluruh atlet setelah lolos seleknas mengikuti program seleksi setelah menempatkan 10 atlet kini jumlahnya telah berkurang menjadi 5 merupakan yang terbaik. "Atlet Timnas MMA Indonesia telah melakukan training camp di Bali dan dipersiapkan secara maksimal." ungkap Ardiansyah Bakrie.
Untuk mengadapi Kejuaraan Dunia MMA Amatir sebelumnya KOBI melakukan proses seleksi nasional atlet MMA katagori amatir yang diikuti 20 atlet datang dari Sasana besar di Indonesia.
"Proses seleksi nasional sangat ketat karena KOBI menginginkan yang terbaik masuk Timnas MMA Indonesia dan dirinya yakin 5 atlet yang lolos tahap akhir diharapkan bisa mencapai prestasi terbaik, kita berdoa bendera Merah Putih berkibar Di Khalifa Sports City "tambah Ardi Bakrie. 
Sedangkan 5 atlet Martial Arts yang masuk skuad Tim Nasional Indonesia ke Kejuaraan Dunia MMA Amatir adalah Budi Setiawan (Kelas terbang Senior ), Rendy Anjar Kusuma ( kelas bantam senior), Edi Erlangga (kelas bantam senior), Toby Prasetya (kelas Light Yunior) dan Firman Muharram Syach (kelas yunior bantam).
Salah satu atlet MMA Indonesia Rendy Anjar Kusuma yang juga anggota Pasukan Katak Armada Barat TNI AL , dirinya bersyukur bersama atlet Timnas MMA Indoneesia bisa tampil pada Kejuaraan Dunia MMA Amatir 2019 dan bahagia menjadi bagian dari sejarah mix martial arts Indonesia. "Tampil di arena Kejuaraan Dunia Amatir perdana dirinya siap meraih medali emas, tidak ada yang tidak bisa jika kita yakin bisa merebutnya, " ungkap Rendy.
Sementara Reva Dedi Utama Direktur Program and Sports TV-One, program MMA Di TV One sangat luar peminatnya dalam kurun waktu belakangan ini. "Pihaknya akan memberikan informasi teraktual selama perjalanan atlet MMA Indonesia bertarung di arena Kejuaraan Dunia MMA Amatir sehingga para penggemar olahraga ini ditanah air tidak ketinggalan berita, "tutup Reva Dedi Utama.

Ardi Bakrie, Indonesian Athlete Ready to Fly the Red and White in the MMA World Amateur Arena
Nov 6 2019, 15:55 by Adi Wiyono


Ardi Bakrie, Indonesian Athlete Ready to Fly the Red and White in the MMA World Amateur Arena

KBRN, Jakarta: Indonesian Martial Arts Committee, KOBI fielded 5 of the best MMA athletes at the 2019 MMA Amateur Mix Martials Arts World Championship which took place at Khalifa Sports City, Isa Town, Manama Bahrain 11-16 Novembet 2019.
Chairperson of the Indonesian Martial Sports Committee, KOBI Ardiansyah Bakrie told the media in Jakarta on Wednesday (11/06/2019) seeing this as new history, could send the MMA National Team to fight in the arena of the MMA 2019 World Championship after Indonesia under KOBI entered the IMMAF membership (Federation Martial Arts Mix International).
All athletes after qualifying seleknas following the selection program after placing 10 athletes now the number has been reduced to 5 is the best. "Indonesian MMA national team athletes have conducted training camps in Bali and are prepared optimally." said Ardiansyah Bakrie.
To face the previous MMA Amateur World Championship, KOBI conducted a national selection process for amateur category MMA athletes, which was followed by 20 athletes coming from the big Sasana in Indonesia.
"The national selection process is very strict because KOBI wants the best to enter the Indonesian MMA National Team and he believes that 5 athletes who passed the final stage are expected to achieve the best performance, we pray the Red and White flag is flying at Khalifa Sports City" added Ardi Bakrie.
While the 5 Martial Arts athletes who entered the Indonesian National Team squad at the MMA Amateur World Championships were Budi Setiawan (Senior flying class), Rendy Anjar Kusuma (senior bantam class), Edi Erlangga (senior bantam class), Toby Prasetya (Light Yunior class) and Firman Muharram Syach (bantam junior class).
One Indonesian MMA athlete Rendy Anjar Kusuma who is also a member of the Indonesian Navy's Western Fleet Frog Forces, he is grateful that with Indonesian MMA national team athletes can appear at the 2019 MMA Amateur World Championship and be happy to be part of the history of Indonesian mix martial arts. "Appearing in the arena of the first World Amateur Championship he is ready to win the gold medal, no one can not if we believe we can win it," said Rendy.
While Reva Dedi Utama is Director of Program and Sports TV-One, the MMA program on TV One is very much in demand in recent times. "It will provide the most actual information during the journey of Indonesian MMA athletes to fight in the arena of the MMA World Amateur Championship so that fans of this sport in the country do not miss the news," concluded Reva Dedi Utama.
